testCaseResult.testCaseName: Repository relationship reference copy lifecycle test case
successfulAssertions: repository-test-case-base-01: Repository connector supplied to conformance suite.
repository-test-case-base-02: Metadata collection for repository connector supplied to conformance suite.
repository-relationship-reference-copy-lifecycle-00: ProjectScope relationship type definition matches known type
repository-relationship-reference-copy-lifecycle-01: ProjectScope reference relationship created; repository supports storage of reference copies.
repository-relationship-reference-copy-lifecycle-02: ProjectScope reference relationship can be retrieved as Relationship.
repository-relationship-reference-copy-lifecycle-03: ProjectScope reference relationship matches the relationship that was saved.
repository-relationship-reference-copy-lifecycle-04: ProjectScope reference relationship status cannot be updated.
repository-relationship-reference-copy-lifecycle-04: ProjectScope reference relationship status cannot be updated.
repository-relationship-reference-copy-lifecycle-05: ProjectScope reference relationship properties cannot be updated.
repository-relationship-reference-copy-lifecycle-06: ProjectScope reference relationship type cannot be changed.
repository-relationship-reference-copy-lifecycle-07: ProjectScope reference relationship identity cannot be changed.
repository-test-case-base-01: Repository connector supplied to conformance suite.
repository-test-case-base-02: Metadata collection for repository connector supplied to conformance suite.
unsuccessfulAssertions: Unexpected Exception Exception : CTS test repository-relationship-reference-copy-lifecycle caught exception FunctionNotSupportedException from method purgeRelationshipReferenceCopy whilst trying to purge a reference copy of a relationship of type ProjectScope.  Exception message was : OMRS-METADATA-COLLECTION-501-001 OMRSMetadataInstanceStore method purgeDeleteRelationshipReferenceCopy for OMRS Connector org.odpi.openmetadata.adapters.repositoryservices.rest.repositoryconnector.OMRSRESTMetadataCollection to repository type REST-connected Repository https://localhost:9445/servers/SUT_Server is not implemented.  Method was invoked with parameters: relationship : Relationship{headerVersion=1, type=InstanceType{typeDefName='ProjectScope', typeDefCategory=TypeDefCategory{typeCode=8, typeName='RelationshipDef', typeDescription='A link between two entities.'}, typeDefGUID='bc63ac45-b4d0-4fba-b583-92859de77dd8', typeDefVersion=3, typeDefDescription='The documentation, assets and definitions that are affected by the project.', typeDefDescriptionGUID='null', typeDefSuperTypes=null, validStatusList=[InstanceStatus{ordinal=15, name='Active', description='The instance is approved and in use.'}, InstanceStatus{ordinal=99, name='Deleted', description='The instance has been deleted and is no longer available.'}], validInstanceProperties=[description, scopeDescription]}, instanceProvenanceType=InstanceProvenanceType{ordinal=1, name='Local to cohort', description='The instance is being maintained within one of the local cohort members.
